name: videoSourceStartPreview
description:
Enables the local video preview.A method for the second instance.
            This method starts the local video preview before joining the channel. Before calling this method, ensure that you do the following:
            
                Call setView to set the local preview window.
                Call videoSourceEnableVideo to enable the video.
            
            
                
                    The local preview enables the mirror mode by default.
                    After the local video preview is enabled, if you call videoSourceLeaveChannel to exit the channel, the local preview remains until you call videoSourceStopPreview to disable it.
